txt.en:
'No doubt your gaze has been drawn to the peaks of Celebdil, Caradhras, and Fanuidhol, but there a great shadow often defeats my eyes. Great, dark clouds move against the wind, and they pass over the land in search of something.

'Flocks of black-winged crebain from Dunland have been circling the Redhorn Gate. It is clear that they are searching for the Company, and I fear that they may have news or have found some clue that we have not ourselves discovered.

'Travel north-east into the Redhorn Gate and defeat these spies of Saruman, then return to me.'

'Just before your return a great concourse of birds flew hastily from the Redhorn Gate. Let us hope that you set enough fear into their ranks to drive them from Eregion, though I doubt not that they will return to pick the bones of the fallen.'
'The crebain can be found in the Redhorn Gate north-east of Echad Dúnann.'
'Let us hope that you drove the foul crebain from Eregion.'
Crebain out of Dunland in the service of Saruman spy out the crevices of the Redhorn Gate, threatening the efforts of the Elves in Eregion.
Crebain can be found north-east of Echad Dúnann in the Redhorn Gate.\n\nAuthlanc has asked that you defeat crebain in the Redhorn Gate.
Talk to Authlanc at Echad Dúnann
Authlanc can be found at Echad Dúnann south-east of the Redhorn Gate.\n\nYou should return to Authlanc and tell him of your success.
